Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2011 04:50PM mvanderhaar wrote: I just had a stereotactic biopsy done this past Tuesday and the after effects were horrible.  The procedure was not painful however when I sat up my whole breast swelled up with blood and I went into shock.  They had to put me on an IV to get my blood pressure back up.  I am now swollen and more black then blue and very very sore.  This has caused me to question all other suggested treatments.  Test came back positive but I am so distracted by how my breast looks and feels and the discomfort.  I think dealing with a positive diagnose would be easier if I didn't feel so out of control with what happened to me during the test.  I'm sorry I did not realize all the risks involved before hand.  perhaps I would have opted for a surgical biopsy.
Posts.Title: core biopsy mudd SarahsMom
